qiskit_aqua.algorithms.adaptive.vqe package¶

Submodules¶

qiskit_aqua.algorithms.adaptive.vqe.vqe module¶

The Variational Quantum Eigensolver algorithm. See https://arxiv.org/abs/1304.3061

class qiskit_aqua.algorithms.adaptive.vqe.vqe.VQE(operator, var_form, optimizer, operator_mode='matrix', initial_point=None, batch_mode=False, aux_operators=None)[source]¶

Bases: qiskit_aqua.algorithms.quantum_algorithm.QuantumAlgorithm

The Variational Quantum Eigensolver algorithm.

See https://arxiv.org/abs/1304.3061

CONFIGURATION = {'defaults': {'optimizer': {'name': 'L_BFGS_B'}, 'variational_form': {'name': 'RYRZ'}, 'initial_state': {'name': 'ZERO'}}, 'depends': ['optimizer', 'variational_form', 'initial_state'], 'description': 'VQE Algorithm', 'input_schema': {'$schema': 'http://json-schema.org/schema#', 'id': 'vqe_schema', 'type': 'object', 'properties': {'operator_mode': {'type': 'string', 'default': 'matrix', 'oneOf': [{'enum': ['matrix', 'paulis', 'grouped_paulis']}]}, 'initial_point': {'type': ['array', 'null'], 'items': {'type': 'number'}, 'default': None}, 'batch_mode': {'type': 'boolean', 'default': False}}, 'additionalProperties': False}, 'name': 'VQE', 'problems': ['energy', 'ising']}¶

__init__(operator, var_form, optimizer, operator_mode='matrix', initial_point=None, batch_mode=False, aux_operators=None)[source]¶

Constructor.

Parameters:
  • operator (Operator) – Qubit operator
  • operator_mode (str) – operator mode, used for eval of operator
  • var_form (VariationalForm) – parametrized variational form.
  • optimizer (Optimizer) – the classical optimization algorithm.
  • initial_point (numpy.ndarray) – optimizer initial point.
  • aux_operators ([Operator]) – Auxiliary operators to be evaluated at each eigenvalue

find_minimum_eigenvalue(initial_point=None)[source]¶

Determine minimum energy state.

Parameters:initial_point (numpy.ndarray[float]) – initial point, or None if not provided.
Returns:Optimized variational parameters, and corresponding minimum eigenvalue.
Raises:ValueError
